Title: IT Manager
JobSummary: We are looking for knowledgeable and motivated IT Manager who will be responsible for overseeing IT personnel and daily operations within the IT department to ensure they are operating effectively. You will also help the project teams manage resources and information and assist with scheduling and planning meetings and project activities.
Responsibilities: Responsibilities Creating strategies for upgrading the companys network software whenever a new update is available. Managing everyday operations, directing the team and coordinating technology installations, updates, and maintenance.
Requirements: Bachelors degree in information technology, computer science,software engineering, or a related field.
